author: Toni L
title: A Treat in the Heart of London
text:
Montcalm...what can I say....the accommodation venue that makes you feel so comfortable. Travelling as a family we were treated with "5 star treatment every time we walked through the hotels doors. The warmth, friendliness, hospitality really stands out.
Rooms very comfortable, clean and modern with all amenities available. Thanks to Isabella for the coffees and disposable nappies and lovely smile. Spacious and Elegant Lobby/ bar/2 restaurants/private lounge/gym/spa/and all the special treatment ...5 STAR
To the whole team, we will be back
Welldone and Greetings from Namibia
The Renecle Famil
Room Tip: Our rooms on the 1st floor where quiet. See more room tips
